content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hey Max, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price. I am looking for the highest possible price for my apartment. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given that the apartment is in the city center and has a good location, I think a fair price would be 800 euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, Max, but I'm looking for a higher price. I'm not opposed to continuing negotiations if you're willing to offer more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment, I'm willing to increase my offer to 850 euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for increasing your offer, Max. However, I'm still looking for a higher price. I'm open to continuing negotiations if you're willing to offer more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt. Keeping in mind that the apartment is newly built and has a one-bedroom layout, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer 900 euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still looking for a higher price. I'm open to continuing negotiations if you're willing to offer more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, considering the state of the apartment and its location, I don't want to overspend. Therefore, I'm not willing to exceed 900 euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your position, Max. Since you're not willing to exceed 900 euros, I'll have to decline. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Let's terminate the negotiation.
name: Max Müller from Germany
